inclusion.criterion: oral or intravenous antibiotic therapy which started within 24 hours of enrollment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of chronic gastrointestinal disease (e.g., inflammatory bowel disease, cystic fibrosis, celiac disease, food allergy) or other severe chronic disease (e.g., neoplastic diseases)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: use of probiotics within 2 weeks prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: use of antibiotics within 4 weeks prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has dizziness and severe diarrhea since yesterday. V. cholerae was seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen.
